name: One Slice
description:
Play as a slice of pizza determined to restore culinary balance to the universe.

Collect a whole arsenal that will allow you to face many evil enemies, such as the deceitful corn cob or the terrifying quiche lorraine !

-

The game is playable but still in development : feel free to leave a comment to tell me what you think. ;-)

-

Current version : 0.1 (28-07-2022)
